includedAssets.title: Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Clay, Jax and the other jailed SAMCRO members are released, but receive a rude welcome from Charming's new sheriff and an assistant US attorney.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clay, Jax and the other jailed SAMCRO members are released, but receive a rude welcome from Charming's new sheriff and an assistant US attorney.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clay, Jax and the other jailed SAMCRO members are released, but receive a rude welcome from Charming's new sheriff and an assistant US attorney.

includedAssets.title: Booster
includedAssets.synopsis: Clay makes a deal with the Mayans that the club won't like, Gemma worries about what Jax now knows about her past and new sheriff Eli Roosevelt makes his presence felt.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clay makes a deal with the Mayans that the club won't like and Gemma worries about what Jax now knows about her past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clay makes a deal with the Mayans that the club won't like, Gemma worries about what Jax now knows about her past and new sheriff Eli Roosevelt makes his presence felt.

includedAssets.title: Dorylus
includedAssets.synopsis: Clay and Jax try to drum up support for the Mexican drug cartel deal. The Feds, meanwhile, think they might have found a way to take SAMCRO down.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Clay and Jax try to drum up support for the Mexican drug cartel deal. The Feds, meanwhile, think they might have found a way to take SAMCRO down.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Clay and Jax try to drum up support for the Mexican drug cartel deal. The Feds, meanwhile, think they might have found a way to take SAMCRO down.

includedAssets.title: Una Venta
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO's business deal with the Mexicans takes them to Tucson, where they have a run-in with the local SOA chapter. Back in Charming, Gemma makes a new ally.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO's business deal with the Mexicans takes them to Tucson, where they have a run-in with the local SOA chapter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO's business deal with the Mexicans takes them to Tucson, where they have a run-in with the local SOA chapter. Back in Charming, Gemma makes a new ally.

includedAssets.title: Brick
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheriff Roosevelt leans on Juice for more information, Piney confronts Clay over John Teller's letter and Bobby and Jax enlist the help of an adult film producer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sheriff Roosevelt leans on Juice for more information, while Piney confronts Clay over John Teller's letter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sheriff Roosevelt leans on Juice for more information, Piney confronts Clay over John Teller's letter and Bobby and Jax enlist the help of an adult film producer.

includedAssets.title: With An X
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO's relationship with the Mexican cartel is put in jeopardy, Opie and Lyla face marital problems and one of Tig's daughters has an urgent request.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO's relationship with the Mexican cartel is put in jeopardy; Opie and Lyla face marital problems; one of Tig's daughters has an urgent request.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO's relationship with the Mexican cartel is put in jeopardy, Opie and Lyla face marital problems and one of Tig's daughters has an urgent request.

includedAssets.title: Fruit For The Crows
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - Fruit For The Crows
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO has to deal with a death threat against Tara and an attack against the Mayans. Meanwhile, Potter pushes Sheriff Roosevelt to lean on Juice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO has to deal with a death threat against Tara and an attack against the Mayans. Meanwhile, Potter pushes Sheriff Roosevelt to lean on Juice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO has to deal with a death threat against Tara and an attack against the Mayans. Meanwhile, Potter pushes Sheriff Roosevelt to lean on Juice.

includedAssets.title: Family Recipe
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO are forced to delay the vote for their new president, Tara makes a decision about her future and Clay takes drastic action in order to protect himself.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO are forced to delay the vote for their new president and Tara makes a decision about her future.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO are forced to delay the vote for their new president, Tara makes a decision about her future and Clay takes drastic action in order to protect himself.

includedAssets.title: Kiss
includedAssets.synopsis: The Niners make a new alliance that causes trouble for SAMCRO. Meanwhile, Tara goes to Margaret Murphy for a favour and Linc tries to clear the air with Juice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Niners make a new alliance that causes trouble for SAMCRO. Meanwhile, Tara goes to Margaret Murphy for a favour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Niners make a new alliance that causes trouble for SAMCRO. Meanwhile, Tara goes to Margaret Murphy for a favour and Linc tries to clear the air with Juice.

includedAssets.title: Hands
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax and Tara discover how hard it is to put SAMCRO behind them, tensions mount between Gemma and Clay and Sheriff Roosevelt confronts Lincoln Potter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax and Tara discover how hard it is to put SAMCRO behind them, tensions mount between Gemma and Clay and Sheriff Roosevelt confronts Lincoln Potter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax and Tara discover how hard it is to put SAMCRO behind them, tensions mount between Gemma and Clay and Sheriff Roosevelt confronts Lincoln Potter.

includedAssets.title: Call Of Duty
includedAssets.synopsis: A powerful adversary emerges and poses a threat to SAMCRO'S relationship with the cartel. Jax also confronts Clay over his mother's beating.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A powerful adversary emerges and poses a threat to SAMCRO'S relationship with the cartel. Jax also confronts Clay over his mother's beating.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A powerful adversary emerges and poses a threat to SAMCRO'S relationship with the cartel. Jax also confronts Clay over his mother's beating.

includedAssets.title: Burnt And Purged Away
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep12 - Burnt And Purged Away
includedAssets.synopsis: SAMCRO negotiates with the Irish Kings to secure the club's future. Meanwhile, Jax confronts Wendy and Clay tries to make a deal with Tara.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: SAMCRO negotiates with the Irish Kings to secure the club's future. Meanwhile, Jax confronts Wendy and Clay tries to make a deal with Tara.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: SAMCRO negotiates with the Irish Kings to secure the club's future. Meanwhile, Jax confronts Wendy and Clay tries to make a deal with Tara.

includedAssets.title: To Be, Act 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax must deal with threats to both SAMCRO and his family, Gemma clears the air with Tara and Tig gets caught up in a dispute with the Niners.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax must deal with threats to both SAMCRO and his family, Gemma clears the air with Tara and Tig gets caught up in a dispute with the Niners.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax must deal with threats to both SAMCRO and his family, Gemma clears the air with Tara and Tig gets caught up in a dispute with the Niners.

includedAssets.title: To Be, Act 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax meets the Irish Kings to tie up the cartel gun deal, the vote on Charming Heights is made and the consequences of Tig's tussle with the Niners become clear.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax meets the Irish Kings to tie up the cartel gun deal and the consequences of Tig's tussle with the Niners become clear.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax meets the Irish Kings to tie up the cartel gun deal, the vote on Charming Heights is made and the consequences of Tig's tussle with the Niners become clear.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season four, the gang get involved with a notorious Mexican drug cartel, while a new sheriff tries to make his presence felt in Charming.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In season four, the gang get involved with a notorious Mexican drug cartel, while a new sheriff tries to make his presence felt in Charming.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman and Charlie Hunnam lead a ragtag band of bikers in Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama. In season four, the gang get involved with a notorious Mexican drug cartel, while a new sheriff tries to make his presence felt in Charming.

includedIn.title: Sons Of Anarchy
includedIn.synopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Top crime drama which follows an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
